descriptionHTML:
With ‘Vegas Fruit Slots’ luck is on your side: Spin the reels and hit the big jackpot! Forget about Poker, Blackjack, Card Games or Roulette – THIS is the REAL casino fun game for a fantastic Las Vegas feeling! Even want more gambling fun? Use the integrated step counter to earn FREE extra chips for every step you take! Gamble and increase your fitness at the same time – a unique combination in this addictive App for your wearable!

FEATURES
★ First Fitness Slot Machine ever
★ Earn extra coins by walking
★ Gamble and vary your bet
★ Choose the number of paylines
★ Auto-Spin for easy, hands-off play
★ Discover amazing bonuses
★ Optimized for Android Wear

‘Vegas Fruit Slots’: EASY to play and easy to win BIG! Download NOW!

‘Vegas Fruit Slots’ is compatible with Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Sony SmartWatch 3 and more.

Important note!
‘Vegas Fruit Slots’ is only playable on an Android Wear device! Please visit http://goo.gl/H4LOEl to find Smartphone or Tablet optimized Android Games!

Thank you for playing ‘Vegas Fruit Slots’!

comments: Needs some work. A bit buggy. Fun, and playable. Keep up the good work!

You Suck Double! Your screening process double sucks! Any mature person can swipe the wrong way. Be a little forgiving and educate your tech department that just because someone swipes a day down, doesnt mean you have to wait 4 hours to try again. You suck! If you don't want reviews like this, then use the God given intellect you're given to allow mistakes by the less intelligent. Not speaking for myself DF's.

Pianoman1379 I am a 60yr old man and swiped the wrong way to input my age and before  I had chance to correct it the screen blanked back to the watch face and now the game thinks I am a child and will not let me back into it - have un-installed it - keep your silly game
